00138 class NetworkNode {
00139 public:
00140     /***members****/
00141     string testbed_ip; //read from configuration file
00142     string label; //read from configuration file
00143     string running_mode; //user or kernel
00144     bool isRV; //read from configuration file
00145     bool isTM; //read from configuration file
00146     Bitvector iLid; //will be calculated
00147     Bitvector FID_to_RV; //will be calculated
00148     Bitvector FID_to_TM; //will be calculated
00149     vector<NetworkConnection *> connections;
00150 };

00152 class NetworkConnection {
00153 public:
00154     /***members****/
00155     string src_label; //read from configuration file
00156     string dst_label; //read from configuration file
00157 
00158     string src_if; //read from configuration file /*e.g. tap0 or eth1*/
00159     string dst_if; //read from configuration file /*e.g. tap0 or eth1*/
00160 
00161     string src_ip; //read from configuration file /*an IP address - i will not resolve mac addresses in this case*/
00162     string dst_ip; //read from configuration file /*an IP address - i will not resolve mac addresses in this case*/
00163 
00164     string src_mac; //will be retrieved using ssh
00165     string dst_mac; //will be retrieved using ssh
00166     Bitvector LID; //will be calculated
00167 };
